# ocp_data_protection_policy

Looks up a data protection policy using filters.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "ocp_customer" "example" {
  name = "customer-a"
}

data "ocp_project" "example" {
  name        = "project-a"
  customer_id = data.ocp_customer.example.id
}

data "ocp_data_protection_policy" "example" {
  customer_id = data.ocp_customer.example.id
  project_id  = data.ocp_project.example.id
  note        = "daily"
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `customer_id` (String) ID of the customer.
- `note` (String) Note.
- `project_id` (String) ID of the project.

### Optional

- `solution_type` (String) Solution type.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the object.
